title: Inheriting a builtin package definition with locally stored patches leads to "No such file" error
body:
Creating a package for gcc in our repo fnal_art that inherits from builtin.gcc

```
from spack.pkg.builtin.gcc import Gcc as BuiltinGcc
class Gcc(BuiltinGcc):

    def patch(self):
        BuiltinGcc.patch()

    def install(self):
        BuiltinGcc.install()

```
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install fnal_art.gcc
```
